name: The Labyrinth Box
description:
You are trapped in a mind-bending Labyrinth Box! Use your gravity defying gun to move objects around and escape out from the window that could be seen at the very top. All the best and have fun!!!

Instructions:

W, A, S, D to Move

Space bar to Jump

Double-click on mouse when pointing at an object to pick up and object, it will glow to indicate that the object had been selected

Right-click to release object, you MUST point your cross hair on the object while doing so to release the object, or it will fail to do so.
